item.label: 1. Work Activities

{{{b}}}Step 3. Answer Questions{{{/b}}}{{{br/}}}Now, we would like to hear your story about your background and experiences as a social media content creator.

item.label: 3. Referral 1

item.note: As a social media content creator, please select the social media {{{b}}}platforms{{{/b}}} where you create or publish content.

item.input: Artwork / Illustrations / Graphics;;; Blogs / Written articles;;; Community posts / Discussion-based content;;; Livestreams;;; Long-form videos;;; Music or original audio;;; News / Commentary;;; Photos / Visual posts;;; Podcasts / Audio content;;; Product promotions / Sponsored content;;; Short-form videos
item.label: 8. Content Type
item.note: As a social media content creator, please select the {{{b}}}types of content{{{/b}}} you typically create as a social media content creator.

item.input: B2B (e.g., thought leadership, industry trends, business insights) ;;; Beauty & Skincare (e.g., tutorials, GRWMs, product reviews, close-up skincare routines) ;;; Education (e.g., study hacks, micro-explainers, online course recommendations) ;;; E-commerce (e.g., live shopping, affiliate product promotions, creator-led launches) ;;; Entertainment (e.g., reaction content, media reviews, pop culture commentary) ;;; Fashion (e.g., outfit hauls, styling tips, fashion challenges, trend breakdowns) ;;; Finance (e.g., budgeting tips, investing basics, relatable money mindset content) ;;; Fitness, Health & Wellness (e.g., workout routines, nutrition tips, habit building, progress tracking) ;;; Food (e.g., recipe videos, food hacks, restaurant reviews, cooking tutorials) ;;; Gaming (e.g., live streams, gameplay highlights, walkthroughs, lore explainers, AI-assisted commentary) ;;; Lifestyle (e.g., daily routines, vlogs, home decor & personal style, aspirational life content) ;;; Marketing & Business (e.g., digital marketing strategies, SEO tips, growth hacks, AI tools, solopreneurship) ;;; Music (e.g., independent releases, creator collabs, behind-the-scenes content) ;;; Parenting (e.g., family routines, kids’ product reviews, child development tips, relatable moments) ;;; Pet (e.g., pet care tips, cute animal content, pet product features) ;;; Real Estate (e.g., virtual home tours, home styling, neighborhood lifestyle guides) ;;; Technology (e.g., gadget reviews, product comparisons, tech tutorials, AI content) ;;; Travel (e.g., destination highlights, travel vlogs, hotel reviews, itinerary tips)
